description.portuguese: Conclua o jogo inteiro novamente no modo invertido

description.english: Killed by Vines
description.german: Werde von Reben getötet.
description.french: Ronces meurtrières
description.italian: Muori per strangolamento da rampicanti
description.spanish: Muerte por enredaderas
description.tchinese: 被蔓藤殺死
description.japanese: ツタによって死ぬ
description.portuguese: Morra por videiras

description.english: Killed both versions of Zee simultaneously during a level
description.german: Beide Versionen von Zee werden während eines Levels gleichzeitig getötet.
description.french: Deux versions de Zee tuées en même temps dans un niveau
description.italian: Entrambe le versioni di Zee muoiono durante un livello
description.koreana: 레벨 중에 두 차원의 Zee가 동시에 사망
description.spanish: Las dos versiones de Zee mueren a la vez durante un nivel
description.schinese: 2个版本的小细在一个关卡里同时被杀死
description.tchinese: 在某個關卡裡令兩個版本的小斯同時死亡
description.russian: Убейте обе версии Зи одновременно во время прохождения уровня
description.japanese: ステージをプレイ中に、両方のジーが同時に死ぬ
description.portuguese: Mate as duas versões de Zee simultaneamente durante uma fase

description.english: Fall from a big height
description.german: Falle aus großer Höhe.
description.french: Grosse chute
description.italian: Cadi da un punto molto alto
description.spanish: Cae desde una gran altura
description.tchinese: 從高處墜落
description.japanese: 高いところから落ちる
description.portuguese: Caia de um lugar muito alto

description.english: Popped a balloon at the fairground
description.german: Bringe einen Ballon auf dem Jahrmarkt zum Platzen.
description.french: Ballon crevé à la fête foraine
description.italian: Fai scoppiare un pallone al luna park
description.spanish: Revienta un globo en la feria
description.schinese: 游乐场上突然出现一个气球
description.tchinese: 在訓練場弄破一個氣球
description.japanese: 遊園地のバルーンが弾ける
description.portuguese: Estoure um balão no parque de diversões

displayName.english: Stuck Between a Rock and a Hard Place
displayName.spanish: Entre la espada y la pared
displayName.schinese: 卡在一块岩石和一处硬地中间
displayName.portuguese: Entre a Pedra e o Abismo

description.english: Get Zee stuck within a puzzle
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass Zee in einem Puzzle feststeckt.
description.french: Coince Zee à l'intérieur d'un puzzle
description.italian: Blocca Zee all'interno di un puzzle
description.spanish: Atasca a Zee en un puzle
description.tchinese: 在一個拼圖中令小斯被困
description.russian: Сделайте так, чтобы Зи застряла при разгадывании головоломки
description.japanese: ジーがパズルの中で動けなくなる
description.portuguese: Prenda Zee dentro de um quebra-cabeça

description.english: Walk through 15 in-level portals during one level
description.german: Gehe während eines Levels durch 15 Portale.
description.french: Traverse 15 portails dans un niveau
description.italian: Attraversa 15 portali durante un livello
description.spanish: Atraviesa 15 portales durante un nivel
description.schinese: 在一个关卡中穿过 15 扇传送门
description.tchinese: 在一個關卡中穿過 15 個關卡內傳送門
description.russian: Пройдите через 15 порталов на одном уровне
description.japanese: ステージをプレイ中に 15 個のステージポータルを通り抜ける
description.portuguese: Passe por 15 vezes em portais de fase durante uma fase

description.english: Create an electric surge in the suburbs 5 times
description.german: Erzeuge 5-mal einen Spannungsstoß in den Vororten.
description.french: Crée une surtension dans la banlieue 5 fois
description.italian: Provoca un blackout nei sobborghi per 5 volte
description.spanish: Crea una sobrecarga eléctrica en la periferia 5 veces
description.tchinese: 在郊區製造 5 次電力衝擊
description.russian: Создайте электрический разряд в пригороде 5 раз
description.japanese: 郊外でエレクトリックサージを5回起こす
description.portuguese: Crie uma sobretensão elétrica no subúrbio 5 vezes

description.english: Rock the horse in the Prologue
description.german: Stoße das Pferd im Prolog an.
description.french: Fais basculer le cheval dans le prologue
description.italian: Fai dondolare il cavallo nel Prologo
description.spanish: Mece al caballo en el prólogo
description.tchinese: 在序章搖動木馬
description.japanese: プロローグで遊具の馬を揺らす
description.portuguese: Balance o cavalo no prólogo

description.english: Make the leaves in the Woods fall from the trees
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass im Wald Blätter von den Bäumen fallen.
description.french: Fais tomber les feuilles des arbres dans les bois
description.italian: Fai cadere le foglie dagli alberi nel Bosco
description.spanish: Haz que caigan las hojas de los árboles del bosque
description.schinese: 在森林里让叶子从树上落下来
description.tchinese: 令森林裡的落葉從樹上掉下
description.russian: Заставьте листья в лесу падать с деревьев
description.japanese: 森で木から葉っぱを落とす
description.portuguese: Faça as folhas caírem das árvores na floresta

description.english: Make the birds in the woods or park fly away
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass die Vögel im Wald oder Park davonfliegen.
description.french: Fais s'envoler les oiseaux dans les bois ou au parc
description.italian: Fai volare via gli uccelli nel Bosco o nel Parco
description.spanish: Haz que vuelen los pájaros del bosque o del parque
description.schinese: 在森林或公园里让鸟飞走
description.tchinese: 令森林或公園裡的鳥飛走
description.russian: Заставьте птиц в лесу или парке улететь
description.japanese: 森か公園で、鳥を飛び立たせる
description.portuguese: Faça os pássaros voarem para longe na floresta ou parque

description.english: Make the bats in the Caves squeak
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass die Fledermäuse in den Höhlen quieken.
description.french: Fais crier les chauves-souris dans la grotte
description.italian: Fai stridere i pipistrelli nelle Grotte
description.spanish: Haz que chirríen los murciélagos de las cuevas
description.schinese: 在洞穴里让蝙蝠发出吱吱声
description.tchinese: 令洞穴裡的蝙蝠吱吱叫
description.russian: Заставьте летучих мышей в пещерах пищать
description.japanese: 洞窟のコウモリを鳴かせる
description.portuguese: Faça os morcegos guincharem nas cavernas

description.english: Create a ripple in the water during the Prologue
description.german: Erzeuge während des Prologs Wellen im Wasser.
description.french: Crée une ondulation dans l'eau dans le prologue
description.italian: Crea un effetto a onde nell'acqua durante il Prologo
description.spanish: Crea una onda en el agua durante el prólogo
description.schinese: 序幕开始时在水中产生涟漪
description.tchinese: 在序章裡的水面製造漣漪
description.russian: Создайте рябь на воде в прологе
description.japanese: プロローグで、水面にさざ波を立てる
description.portuguese: Crie uma ondulação na água durante o prólogo

description.english: Turn on the Fire hydrant in the Suburbs
description.german: Schalte den Feuerhydranten in den Vororten an.
description.french: Active la bouche d'incendie dans la banlieue
description.italian: Attiva l'idrante nei Sobborghi
description.spanish: Activa la boca de incendios en la periferia
description.tchinese: 在郊區開啟消防栓
description.japanese: 郊外で、消火栓を開く
description.portuguese: Ative o hidrante de incêndio no subúrbio

description.english: Bang the bins in Suburbs
description.german: Schlag in den Vororten gegen die Mülleimer.
description.french: Tape dans les poubelles dans la banlieue
description.italian: Colpisci i bidoni nei Sobborghi
description.spanish: Golpea las papeleras de la periferia
description.tchinese: 在郊區碰撞垃圾桶
description.russian: Постучите по мусорным бакам в пригороде
description.japanese: 郊外でゴミ入れを攻撃する
description.portuguese: Derrube as latas no subúrbio

description.english: Destroy the lights on the power-lines in the suburbs
description.german: Zerstörte die Lichter an den Stromkabeln in den Vororten.
description.french: Détruis les lignes électriques dans la banlieue
description.italian: Distruggi le luci della rete elettrica nei Sobborghi
description.spanish: Destruye las luces de los tendidos eléctricos de la periferia
description.tchinese: 破壞郊區裡電力線上的電燈
description.russian: Погасите свет на столбах линий электропередачи в пригороде
description.japanese: 郊外で電灯を破壊する
description.portuguese: Destrua as luzes dos postes no subúrbio

description.english: Make the raccoon run away
description.german: Verscheuche den Waschbär.
description.french: Fais fuir le raton-laveur
description.italian: Fai scappare il procione
description.spanish: Ahuyenta al mapache
description.tchinese: 令浣熊跑走
description.japanese: タヌキが逃げるように仕向ける
description.portuguese: Faça o guaxinim fugir

description.english: Interrupt the cow being taken by aliens
description.german: Unterbinde die Entführung der Kuh durch die Aliens.
description.french: Empêche les extraterrestres d'enlever la vache
description.italian: Impedisci agli alieni di rapire la mucca
description.spanish: Impide que los extraterrestres se lleven a la vaca
description.schinese: 阻挡被外星人带走的牛
description.tchinese: 阻止牛隻被外星人帶走
description.japanese: エイリアンが牛を連れ去るのを邪魔する
description.portuguese: Não deixe que a vaca seja levada pelos alienígenas

displayName.japanese: ケンタッキーダービー

description.english: Start the horses racing in the fairground
description.german: Starte das Pferderennen auf dem Jahrmarkt.
description.french: Fais courir les chevaux à la fête foraine
description.italian: Fai partire la giostra dei cavalli nel Luna park
description.spanish: Haz que corran los caballos de la feria
description.schinese: 在游乐场开始旋转木马
description.tchinese: 在訓練場開始賽馬
description.japanese: 遊園地でメリーゴーラウンドを動かす
description.portuguese: Ligue o carrossel no parque de diversões

description.english: Make the rat in fairground to run away
description.german: Sorge dafür, dass die Ratte auf dem Jahrmarkt wegläuft.
description.french: Fais fuir le rat à la fête foraine
description.italian: Fai scappare il topo nel Luna park
description.spanish: Haz que huyan las ratas de la feria
description.tchinese: 令訓練場裡的老鼠跑走
description.japanese: 遊園地でネズミが逃げるように仕向ける
description.portuguese: Faça o rato fugir no parque de diversões

description.english: Knock all four coconuts off the palm trees within one level
description.german: Schlage alle vier Kokosnüsse in einem Level von den Palmen.
description.french: Fais tomber les 4 noix de cocos des palmiers dans un niveau
description.italian: Fai cadere le 4 noci di cocco dagli alberi in un livello
description.koreana: 한 레벨에서 야자나무의 코코넛 네 개를 모두 떨어트리기
description.spanish: Haz que caigan los cuatro cocos de las palmeras en un nivel
description.schinese: 在一个关卡中敲掉棕榈树上的所有4个椰子
description.tchinese: 在一個關卡裡把棕櫚樹上的四個椰子打下來
description.russian: Сбейте все четыре кокоса с пальм на одном уровне
description.japanese: ステージ内で、ヤシの木から4つ全てのココナッツを落とす
description.portuguese: Faça os quatro cocos caírem dos coqueiros em uma fase

description.english: Tap the beach ball 25 times without it hitting the ground
description.german: Tippe den Strandball 25-mal, ohne dass er den Boden berührt.
description.french: Frappe le ballon de plage 25 fois sans le faire tomber au sol
description.italian: Tocca il pallone da spiaggia 25 volte senza farlo cadere a terra
description.spanish: Toca la pelota de playa 25 veces sin que caiga al suelo
description.schinese: 颠击沙滩球25次，不可以碰到地面
description.tchinese: 在不讓沙灘球接觸地面的情況下輕觸它 25 次
description.russian: Набейте пляжный мяч 25 раз, не дав ему коснуться земли
description.japanese: ビーチボールを一回も地面に落とさず25回タップする
description.portuguese: Faça embaixadinhas com a bola de praia 25 vezes sem deixar ela cair

description.english: The beach ball ed 5 metres high
description.german: Erreiche mit dem Strandball eine Höhe von 5 m.
description.french: Le ballon de plage s'est élevé à 5 m
description.italian: Il pallone da spiaggia ha raggiunto 5 metri di altezza
description.spanish: Haz que la pelota de playa alcance una altura de 5 metros
description.tchinese: 沙灘球達致 5 米高度。
description.japanese: ビーチボールを5 の高さまで浮かせる
description.portuguese: Faça a bola de praia alcançar 5 de altura
